Uncleaned_Reviews: while i've purchased items amazon years, i rarely write reviews. i felt compelled write one because, although reviews point, i never seen good product get bad reviews. i'm hoping people purchase these, star rating accurate product itself. i'll address three biggest complaints i've read others:sound quality: i think headphones sound great. i've never owned expensive pair i'm able compare higher-end offerings, i've owned dozens cheap mid-range headphones 15-50 range. i'm audiophile musician i'm missing something coming through, isn't, i'm fine ignorance. i would say they're slightly better apple's buds (which i liked much used years, recently using redesigned ones year). there's tinny, listening sound that's all-too-common headphones price range. as far people saying compare apple's buds, well i know, maybe crazy exclusive version apple's buds amazing. but compared regular earpods, i think amazon's headphones actually sound bit better. they provide nice, full sound represent highs, lows mids equally well (mainly listening metal).fit feel: some people complained falling, feeling like they're going fall, ears. there's validity this, although obviously depends specific ears. i feel like they're going fall all, i give cord tug, stay secure apple buds.read
